```{r}
text_df <- tibble(text= text_v)

text_df %>%unnest_tokens(output = word, input = text)
 
text_tk <- text_df %>% unnest_tokens(output = word, input = text)
text_tk %>% 
   count(word, sort = TRUE)

text_tk %>% 
   count(word, sort = TRUE) %>% 
   filter(n > 10) %>% 
   mutate(word = reorder(word, n)) %>% 
   ggplot(aes(word, n)) +
   geom_col() +
   coord_flip()

 text_df <- tibble(text= text_x)

text_df %>%unnest_tokens(output = word, input = text)
 
text_tk <- text_df %>% unnest_tokens(output = word, input = text)
text_tk %>% 
   count(word, sort = TRUE)

text_tk %>% 
   count(word, sort = TRUE) %>% 
   filter(n > 9) %>% 
   mutate(word = reorder(word, n)) %>% 
   ggplot(aes(word, n)) +
   geom_col() +
   coord_flip()
```
